    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    BankSlip
    The BankSlip class represents a payment method using a bank slip.
    Card
    The Card class represents a payment method using a credit or debit card.
    ConfirmationController
    The ConfirmationController class manages the confirmation screen for ticket purchases.
    DashboardController
    The DashboardController class manages the main dashboard screen of the ticket sales system.
    DataAccessObject<T>
    The DataAccessObject class provides generic methods for reading and writing data to and from a JSON file.
    Event
    The Event class represents an event that has a name, description, date, and a list of available seats.
    EventAlreadyExistsException
     
    EventController
    Controller for managing events, including registration, removal, and seat management.
    EventDAO
    The EventDAO class provides methods for managing event data, allowing for operations such as adding, updating, deleting, and retrieving events stored in a JSON file.
    EventDetailController
    Controller responsible for managing the event detail screen.
    EventFeedback
    The EventFeedback class represents a user's feedback for a specific event.
    EventListController
    Controller responsible for managing the event list screen.
    EventNotFoundException
     
    EventTest
     
    EventUpdateException
     
    InsufficientFundsException
     
    InvalidEventDateException
     
    InvalidPaymentMethodException
     
    InvalidTicketException
    Exception thrown when an invalid ticket is encountered.
    LanguageController
    The LanguageController class manages the language translation system for the application.
    Languages
     
    LoginController
    Controller for handling user login functionality.
    Main
    Main application class for the Ticket Sales Manager application.
    Payment
    The Payment class is an abstract representation of a payment method.
    PaymentException
     
    PaymentFailedException
     
    PaymentMethod
     
    PaymentProcessingException
     
    PhysicalMoney
    The PhysicalMoney class represents a payment method using physical cash.
    Pix
    The Pix class represents a Pix payment method, a popular instant payment system in Brazil.
    ProfileController
    Controller for managing the user's profile.
    Purchase
    The Purchase class represents a ticket purchase made by a user.
    PurchaseConfirmation
    The PurchaseConfirmation class is responsible for sending purchase confirmation emails to users.
    PurchaseController
    Controller to manage purchase processes, including creation, cancellation, and listing of purchases.
    PurchaseController
    Controller for handling the purchase process in the ticket sales system.
    PurchaseDAO
    The PurchaseDAO class provides data access methods for managing purchase data.
    PurchaseException
     
    PurchaseNotFoundException
     
    Scenes
     
    ScreensController
    Controller responsible for managing and loading different scenes (FXML views) in the application.
    SeatUnavailableException
     
    SignUpController
    Controller for handling the user registration process in the ticket sales system.
    StageController
    Controller class for managing the main stage (window) of the application.
    TED
    The TED class represents a bank transfer payment method (Transferência Eletrônica Disponível).
    Ticket
    The Ticket class represents a ticket for a specific event.
    TicketAlreadyCanceledException
    Exception thrown when an attempt is made to cancel a ticket that has already been canceled.
    TicketAlreadyExistsException
    Exception thrown when an attempt is made to create a ticket that already exists.
    TicketAlreadyReactivatedException
    Exception thrown when an attempt is made to reactivate a ticket that is already active.
    TicketController
    Controller responsible for managing ticket operations in the system.
    TicketDAO
    The TicketDAO class provides data access methods for managing ticket data.
    TicketNotCancelableException
    Exception thrown when an attempt is made to cancel a ticket that cannot be canceled.
    TicketNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when a requested ticket cannot be found.
    TicketSalesManagerException
    The TicketSalesManagerException class is a custom exception for handling errors specific to the Ticket Sales Manager application.
    TicketsController
    Controller responsible for managing the ticket list of a user.
    TicketTest
     
    TicketUnavailableException
     
    User
    The User class represents a user of the ticket sales system.
    UserAlreadyExistsException
    Exception thrown when a user registration attempt fails due to the user already existing.
    UserController
    Controller responsible for managing users in the system.
    UserDAO
    The UserDAO class provides data access methods for managing user data.
    UserDAOException
    Exception thrown when there is an error related to user data access operations.
    UserNotAuthorizedException
    Exception thrown when a user attempts to perform an action that requires administrative privileges.
    UserNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when a user cannot be found in the system.
    UserRemovalException
    Exception thrown when there is an error removing a user.
    UserTest
     
    UserTickets
     
    UserUpdateException
    Exception thrown when there is an error updating user information.
